alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Salt Lake and southeastern Davis Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 700 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Salt Lake, or near Bountiful, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Bountiful, Farmington, Kaysville, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport and Fruit Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 307 and 327. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 116 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
